\ifthenelse{\equal{\Footer}{on}}{

     \renewcommand{\headrulewidth}{0pt}
     \renewcommand{\footrulewidth}{0.5pt}
     \fancypagestyle{plain}{\fancyhf{}}
     \fancypagestyle{myfoot}{\fancyhf{}
          \lfoot{%
               \ifstrempty{<%company%>}{}{<%company%>\\}
               \ifstrempty{<%companyaddress1%>}{}{<%companyaddress1%>\\}
               \ifstrempty{<%companyaddress2%>}{}{<%companyaddress2%>\\}
               <%companyzip%> <%companycity%>\\
          }
          \cfoot{%
               \strut\ifstrempty{<%iban%>}{}{IBAN: <%iban%>}\\
               \strut\ifstrempty{<%bic%>}{}{BIC: <%bic%>}\\
               \strut\\
               \ifthenelse{\equal{\PageNumber}{on}}{\strut \LANGuse{footer_page} \thepage}{}
          }
          \rfoot{%
               \strut\ifstrempty{<%companyemail%>}{}{<%companyemail%>\\}
               \strut\ifstrempty{<%companywebsite%>}{}{<%companywebsite%>\\}
               \strut\ifstrempty{<%tel%>}{}{<%tel%>\\}
          }
     }
}{}
